comment.author: 96028816@N00
comment._content: That is looking east over the reservoir with the Boat Lake on the left and the Swan Lake above it. All of those new homes are on French & Condie Streets

comment.author: 55545473@N04
comment._content: Byrd Park is to the right of the reservoir.

comment.author: 72556610@N00
comment._content: The vita course is to the right, too! Sometimes, people will walk/run up the steps to the reservoir for cardio. Tennis courts are to the left and the site of J.B. Cary school. I like this photo a lot.

comment.author: 56077378@N06
comment._content: I think in the early days the reservoir had been a swimming pool?

comment.author: 60804302@N08
comment._content: In the 1930's Shield's Lake was a swimming pool .
